experience: You and R. Craig both know Trish Bear, Jared Vishney, and 36 others

-Top producing office broker in Lee & Associates' 35 year history -20 time top producer at Lee & Associates-Specializes in leasing and sales of office projects, representing tenants and landlords in the Phoenix Metro area-One of the leading office brokers in the metro Phoenix market since 1984-In 1991, was one of eight Founding Principals who formed Lee & Associates Arizona-The Coppola-Cheney Group has been the top-performing office team at Lee & Associates for 20 of their 22 years -Manages a diverse, successful business while staying extremely involved with the commercial real estate industry and the community, donating over 1,000 hours of charitable time annually-Industry Designations: CCIM (Commercial Council Investment Member) SIOR (Society of Industrial and Office Realtors) CRE (Counselor of Real Estate) --Less than 40 people worlwide have combined all of the above designations-6 time NAIOP office broker of the year
Within Lee & Associates, Craig Coppola and Andrew Cheney are the two Principals who lead The Coppola-Cheney Group. Craig and Andrew specialize in office sales and leasing.

summary: Craig Coppola is the highest producing office broker in Lee & Associates' 35-year history. He is one of the eight Founding Principals of Lee & Associates Arizona and one of Arizona’s most accomplished real estate professionals, with three decades of leasing and sales experience.Within Lee & Associates, Craig Coppola and Andrew Cheney are the two Principals who lead The Coppola-Cheney Group. The Coppola-Cheney Group is the number one office leasing and sales team in Lee & Associates’ history. With 30 years’ of experience and 3,500 transactions, The Coppola-Cheney Group provides a higher level of brokerage skills, market knowledge, and ability to negotiate their clients' transactions. Craig has earned the top three industry designations: CCIM, SIOR, and CRE. Less than 40 people worldwide hold all three designations. Craig is 1 of only 17 professionals in Arizona who hold both their CCIM and SIOR designations.The Coppola-Cheney Group Mission Statement:  To offer superior representation services to our clients by providing the highest level of expertise and guidance in their real estate portfolio. We strive to contribute our utmost efforts toward establishing long-term, mutually rewarding relationships. Simply put: To build relationships that last.
name: R. Craig Coppola
